name: You Can't Do That Yet.
description:
The game will be built as a written text game with no visuals to allow players to build their own ideas of how the scenes look, as well as no pronouns used to allow for the player to build their own views of who the characters are.

Each day the player will start in bed, and must achieve all the tasks of the day before being able to go back to bed and go to sleep again. Over time, these tasks will increase and the narrative will form.
